summary: FRONT PASSENGER SIDE TIRE IS MORE THEN 5 DEGREES OUT OF CAMBER CAUSING THE TIRE PULL, CREATE MORE HEAT, AND WEAR OUT. I CONTACTED DEALER AND WAS INFORMED RAM DOESN'T HAVE A CAMBER ADJUSTMENT SO THERE'S NO WAY TO CORRECT IT WITH OUT PUTTING AFTERMARKET BALL JOINTS IN I NOTICED IT AT LESS THEN 5000 MILES
